synopsis:
As Shu’s village was beeing attacked by an unknown enemy, he and his friends, Jiro and Kluke decide to defend their home. They soon meet warior Zola and recive the powers of Shadow, an ability that let’s them transfor thier shadow into a powerfull monster. Shu recives one of the most powerfull monsters, Blue Dragon, and they all set out to defeat t… more As Shu’s village was beeing attacked by an unknown enemy, he and his friends, Jiro and Kluke decide to defend their home.
They soon meet warior Zola and recive the powers of Shadow, an ability that let’s them transfor thier shadow into a powerfull monster. Shu recives one of the most powerfull monsters, Blue Dragon, and they all set out to defeat their enemy.
